scripts.dev:backend: powershell -NoProfile -Command "if (Test-Path 'app/backend/.venv/Scripts/python.exe') { & 'app/backend/.venv/Scripts/python.exe' -m uvicorn server:app --app-dir app/backend --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000 --reload } else { python -m uvicorn server:app --app-dir app/backend --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000 --reload }"
